import React from'react';import{useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Home,Calendar,Ticket,User,List,CheckSquare}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BottomNav=_ref=>{let{theme,user}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const location=useLocation();const isDark=theme==='dark';// ✅ FIX: Check if user exists before checking role
